definition: (old) commanding general/commander-in-chief/(Qing dynasty) title for a governor-general (provincial military governor) 總督|总督[zong3 du1]
to be in command/(fig.) to dominate over other considerations/to be given overemphasis
commander-in-chief, the equivalent of king in Chinese chess
rook sacrifice to save the king (in Chinese chess); fig. to protect a senior figure by blaming an underling/to pass the buck
Marshal Zhao, aka Zhao Gongming or Zhao Xuantan, God of Wealth in the Chinese folk tradition and Taoism
preoccupied with school grades/overemphasis on test scores
The Good Soldier Švejk (Schweik), satirical novel by Czech author Jaroslav Hašek (1883-1923)

sentences.english: He was handsome in a raffish kind of way.
sentences.chinese: 他的帥是一種放蕩不羈的帥。

sentences.english: He was handsome in a raffish kind of way.
sentences.chinese: 他的帥是一種放蕩不羈的帥。

sentences.english: With girl change as handsome, toward become idols march.
sentences.chinese: 以少女變身爲帥男，朝成爲偶像進軍。

sentences.english: You lood great in your new coat .
sentences.chinese: 你穿這件新大衣真是帥了。

sentences.english: Minister Lin so LaoZheng derivation handsome in gone with the wind.
sentences.chinese: 林部長於是就要用老鄭引出帥飄。

sentences.english: Handsome floating listen to snow ling smoke to Jin Zhai just want to try to help ling smoke.
sentences.chinese: 帥飄聽雪兒說凌煙要去金寨就想要設法幫助凌煙。

sentences.english: Yes, indeed, People say he's the smartest young man.
sentences.chinese: 帥極了，人們都說他最帥的小夥子。

sentences.english: Dark hair blue yamulka, absolutely gorgeous.
sentences.chinese: 黑頭髮，帶藍圓頂小帽，真是帥極了。

sentences.english: You may find someone, as handsome as He rundong. Ha-ha.
sentences.chinese: 你可以找個人，像何潤東那麼帥的。

sentences.english: Handsome flying back to Shanghai, can be said to be met with the help of others.
sentences.chinese: 帥飄重回上海，可以說是遇到了貴人相助。

sentences.english: His son is tall and handsome, 29 years old, a scientist.
sentences.chinese: 他的兒子又高又帥，29歲，當科學家。

sentences.english: Even a Paris street sweeper is so handsome.
sentences.chinese: 巴黎大街上一個普通的清潔工居然都這麼帥。

sentences.english: Well, if I had a cool cowboy hat like that.
sentences.chinese: 要是我有這麼帥的牛仔帽。

sentences.english: It's so tough being handsome because girls always end up having a crush on me.
sentences.chinese: 長這麼帥真是難爲，因爲女孩子老是煞到我。

sentences.english: He is an honest boy though not handsome with medium stature.
sentences.chinese: 他中等個頭，長得不算帥，但人忠厚老實。

sentences.english: My husband isn’t handsome, but he certainly is unique.
sentences.chinese: 我丈夫不帥，但是他肯定是獨一無二的。
